verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%>
"I have heard <S%H8085><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> such <S%H428><s%> things; <S%H7227><s%> Sorry <S%H5999><s%> comforters <S%H5162><s%> are you all. <S%H3605><s%>
"Is there [no] limit <S%H7093><s%> to windy <S%H7307><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>? Or <S%H176><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> plagues <S%H4834><s%> you that you answer <S%H6030><s%>?

"I too <S%H1571><s%> could speak <S%H1696><s%> like you, If <S%H3863><s%> I were in your place. <S%H8478><s%> I could compose <S%H2266><s%> words <S%H4405><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, And shake <S%H5128><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> at you.
"I could strengthen <S%H553><s%> you with my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> And the solace <S%H5205><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%> could lessen <S%H2820><s%> [your pain.]
"If <S%H518><s%> I speak, <S%H1696><s%> my pain <S%H3511><s%> is not lessened, <S%H2820><s%> And if I hold <S%H2308><s%> back, <S%H2308><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> has left <S%H1980><s%> me?
"But now <S%H6258><s%> He has exhausted <S%H3811><s%> me; Thou hast laid <S%H8074><s%> waste <S%H8074><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my company. <S%H5712><s%>

"And Thou hast shriveled <S%H7059><s%> me up, It has become <S%H1961><s%> a witness; <S%H5707><s%> And my leanness <S%H3585><s%> rises <S%H6965><s%> up against me, It testifies <S%H6030><s%> to my face. <S%H6440><s%>

"His anger <S%H639><s%> has torn <S%H2963><s%> me and hunted <S%H7852><s%> me down, <S%H7852><s%> He has gnashed <S%H2786><s%> at me with His teeth; <S%H8127><s%> My adversary <S%H6862><s%> glares <S%H3913><s%> <S%H5869><s%> at me.

"They have gaped <S%H6473><s%> at me with their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> They have slapped <S%H5221><s%> me on the cheek <S%H3895><s%> with contempt; <S%H2781><s%> They have massed <S%H4390><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me.
"God <S%H410><s%> hands <S%H5462><s%> me over <S%H5462><s%> to ruffians, <S%H5760><s%> And tosses <S%H3399><s%> me into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

"I was at ease, <S%H7961><s%> but He shattered <S%H6565><s%> me, And He has grasped <S%H270><s%> me by the neck <S%H6203><s%> and shaken <S%H9455><s%> me to pieces; <S%H9455><s%> He has also set <S%H6965><s%> me up as His target. <S%H4307><s%>

"His arrows <S%H7228><s%> surround <S%H5437><s%> me. Without <S%H3808><s%> mercy <S%H2550><s%> He splits <S%H6398><s%> my kidneys <S%H3629><s%> open; <S%H6398><s%> He pours <S%H8210><s%> out my gall <S%H4845><s%> on the ground. <S%H776><s%>
"He breaks <S%H6555><s%> through <S%H6555><s%> me with breach <S%H6556><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> breach; <S%H6556><s%> He runs <S%H7323><s%> at me like a warrior. <S%H1368><s%>
"I have sewed <S%H8609><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my skin, <S%H1539><s%> And thrust <S%H9414><s%> my horn <S%H7161><s%> in the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
"My face <S%H6440><s%> is flushed <S%H9147><s%> from weeping, <S%H1065><s%> And deep <S%H6757><s%> darkness <S%H6757><s%> is on my eyelids, <S%H6079><s%>
Although <S%H5921><s%> there is no <S%H3808><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> in my hands, <S%H3709><s%> And my prayer <S%H8605><s%> is pure. <S%H2134><s%>
"O earth, <S%H776><s%> do not cover <S%H3680><s%> my blood, <S%H1818><s%> And let there be no <S%H408><s%> [resting] place <S%H4725><s%> for my cry. <S%H2201><s%>
"Even <S%H1571><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> my witness <S%H5707><s%> is in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> And my advocate <S%H7717><s%> is on high. <S%H4791><s%>
"My friends <S%H7453><s%> are my scoffers; <S%H9238><s%> My eye <S%H5869><s%> weeps <S%H1811><s%> to God. <S%H433><s%>
"O that a man <S%H1397><s%> might plead <S%H3198><s%> with God <S%H433><s%> As a man <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> with his neighbor! <S%H7453><s%>
"For when a few <S%H4557><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> are past, <S%H857><s%> I shall go <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H734><s%> of no <S%H3808><s%> return. <S%H7725><s%>
